=======
Changes
=======

0.4 - Sep 24, 2020
==================
* Further arguments parsed for passing to OMERO.blitz

0.3 - Jan 13, 2020
==================
* Drop support for Python 2

0.2 - Jan 19, 2018
==================
* Update to match https://github.com/ome/omero-cli-render/pull/1

0.1 - April 28, 2016
====================
* Initial release. Based on https://github.com/openmicroscopy/openmicroscopy/pull/4574
